mapper.insert: insert into game_session(user_id, room_id, is_host) values(#{userId}, #{roomId}, #{isHost})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id FROM game_session WHERE room_Id = #{value} and is_host = 1;
SELECT user_id FROM game_session WHERE user_Id = #{value};
mapper.update: UPDATE game_session SET is_host = true WHERE user_id = ( SELECT user_id FROM (SELECT user_id from game_session WHERE room_id = #{roomId} ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1) as t);
